ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Patch Problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Kernel32 is a pain. I have had that happen to me...it is a Windows thing not an EQ thing. Try re-installing Windows over your current Windows. A lot of the
ygData.messageBody:
Kernel32 is a pain. I have had that happen to me...it is a Windows thing not an EQ thing. Try re-installing Windows over your current Windows. A lot of the time that will fix things. Remember you will lose any screeensavers,etc...you have in your Windows files. And anything you have saved on the desktop. Be sure and do your backups and good luck...:>

----- Original Message -----
From: toddn070
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, July 27, 2002 1:19 AM
Subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] Patch Problem


Ever since I've downloaded the new patch I can't seem to get on. I
have the latest ver. of IE. I keep getting a Kernel32.dll error
after I enter my signon and password and then I hit enter and my
screen goes black and then I get the error. I am so angry right
know. HELP ME PLEEEAAASE.
